column1: America stands with Iranians demonstrating for freedom. Ayatollah authoritarians may attempt to crush dissent but they cannot forever crush the human spirit.
Merry Christmas from our family to yours! https://t.co/QpJw4np2JC

China demands a loyalty oath from the press imprisons minorities uses facial recognition to monitor and repress dissenters censors the internet and media and then boasts of glorious unity. How dear American freedom so hard won. https://t.co/4uOLIBIqtJ

Heartfelt sorrow with the death of Pete Frates the young baseball star stricken with ALS who inspired the #IceBucketChallenge that raised millions for critical research. A legacy of courage grace and nobility even as life dealt him tragedy.
Happy Thanksgiving from my family to yours! https://t.co/wajWGyHv3k

Prof. Warren’s Medicare for All fails the test: Countries with socialized medicine make their numbers work through limits on care cost sharing and higher middle class taxes. Pretending otherwise is inauthentic and disingenuous.

Ann and I are heartbroken for the victims of the horrific attacks in Mexico. Our prayers are with their families who have suffered such an unspeakable tragedy. The U.S. must work with Mexican officials to hold accountable those responsible for this senseless violence.

While Warren and Sanders push Medicare for All they apparently haven’t noticed that Medicare for Some is about to go bankrupt. Instead of fairy tale proposals we should take bipartisan steps toward making sure current programs are around for the long-haul.
Great costumes! Thomas #OutOfTheWill! https://t.co/ta6aJqfYq3
Al Baghdadi spread “fire and brimstone” on earth; now he feels it for himself in hell. To all who arranged his change of venue—the intel officers the President the warriors—thank you.
I stand with the @UtahJazz in pledging to promote civility in our state and our country. Let’s #LeadTogether in showing others what it means to be a Utahn. https://t.co/4vRu0Whxbb
It’s unthinkable that Turkey would not suffer consequences for malevolent behavior which was contrary to the interests of the United States and our friends.

Pleased to see @UUtah selected by the Commission on Presidential Debates to host the 2020 VP Debate. The importance of service and civility are two core values in the hearts of Utahns and I can’t think of a better state to host this debate. Appreciate the work of @UtahDebateCom. https://t.co/v0aECSWLzk
Enjoyed the pumpkin patch with my sweetheart and the two little pumpkins we brought with us! https://t.co/0lMyUFQQws
By all appearances the President’s brazen and unprecedented appeal to China and to Ukraine to investigate Joe Biden is wrong and appalling.

When the only American citizen President Trump singles out for China’s investigation is his political opponent in the midst of the Democratic nomination process it strains credulity to suggest that it is anything other than politically motivated.

If the President asked or pressured Ukraine’s president to investigate his political rival either directly or through his personal attorney it would be troubling in the extreme. Critical for the facts to come out.

.@US_FDA should consider recalling e-cigarettes as it continues to investigate recent deaths and illnesses related to vaping. I’m increasingly concerned that a generation of young people has been deceived into thinking e-cigarettes are safe.

Johnny Isakson has cast a bright beam in our nation’s Capitol. A man of rare integrity unwavering honesty & profound character his work has helped shape American greatness. His decision to retire from the Senate will dim the light of goodness he’s shed on it for so many years.

.@CindyMcCain and the McCain family have created a new way to honor John’s legacy by encouraging #ActsofCivility. John left this country and this world better off and this is a wonderful way to keep his spirit and character alive.

Today marks one year since the passing of John McCain. Courageous honorable driven by a duty to family country & God John exemplified the values we as Americans hold so dear. I'm blessed to have called him a friend. May we continue to be inspired by his heroism and character.

Iran’s vicious threats to an American citizen and to the Foundation for Defense of Democracies are further examples of its treachery its untrustworthiness and its malign intent. Those in businesses or governments who look away from this reality make a dangerous error.
Great to join @GovHerbert Congressman Bishop @RepBenMcAdams and friends yesterday at @MeritMedical for @VP’s #USMCA event. #utpol https://t.co/G2XW78b19B

In an era of ballooning deficits; social racial and economic divisions; and isolationist tendencies socialism isn’t the solution. Conservatives must promote a governing vision that reaffirms our core principles. https://t.co/0ZVWhzIXAT
Live soon→ I’ll be making the case for Conservatism at the @SutherlandInst. Tune in: https://t.co/ijMWETHLZD
Nice try but socialism isn’t the answer. If it was maybe Bernie would have something to show for his 3 decades in Congress. #AllHatNoCattle https://t.co/nvInZ17oEX
Asked why @BernieSanders is so angry the answer is simple: 28 years in Congress and never able to pass even a scintilla of his socialist agenda. All hat no cattle.
The chants at last night’s rally were offensive and I’m glad the President has disavowed them.
People can disagree over politics and policy but telling American citizens to go back to where they came from is over the line.

The president’s comments were destructive demeaning and disunifying. The President of the United States has a unique and noble calling to unite the American people – of all different races colors and national origins. In that respect the president failed badly.
His selfless leadership and lifelong policy work were critical to the tax and regulatory reform that have helped propel the economy. A man like Paul Ryan does not often come along.

The fault for our 2012 loss is mine alone; @SpeakerRyan was a tireless campaigner fundraiser and conservative champion. As the sole person who could unite the House he acquiesced to be Speaker as a service to the country.
Congratulations @USWNT on your hard-fought victory! Back-to-back World Champions. Simply amazing. #OneNationOneTeam https://t.co/FXsChQDzkd

The President’s praise for MBS the man who US intel says ordered or authorized the heinous murder of a WaPo columnist & Saudi dissident sends the wrong message to the world. It’s past time for Congress & the administration to impose sanctions for the murder of Jamal Khashoggi.
Requiring this kind of reporting to the FBI is precisely what I was referring to. Thank you next. https://t.co/bbcqWcDLAv

Being a father is the most important job I will ever have. And watching Tagg Matt Josh Ben and Craig become fathers themselves has been one of the greatest blessings of my life. Wishing all the dads out there a happy #FathersDay. https://t.co/pHcpoFUEDb

Inspired by the people of Hong Kong who are peacefully demonstrating to retain their freedoms and rights. I salute your cause your honor your courage. The images of your  valiant faces are a stark contrast with the ugly hand of China’s repression.
With Marty Feldstein’s passing we lose a brilliant economist a celebrated professor and a central figure in the Reagan revolution. I will miss his wise counsel and heartwarming friendship.
I really hope @AnnRomney appreciates her Mother’s Day gift… https://t.co/FnACKduZzK

A mother’s role is one of the most important in our society. My mother Lenore taught me so many lessons about life family and faith. And @AnnRomney did the same for our boys. To all the mothers out there—happy #MothersDay! https://t.co/zWvlX0AbxT

Proud of Ann’s work to find treatments for the debilitating brain diseases that imperil millions of sufferers and their families. A remarkable wife mother grandmother and champion for cures. https://t.co/JV6v0HipJY

Congratulations to @Derek4Chair @aarontstarks and Kendra Seely who will be terrific leaders for the @UtahGOP. I look forward to working with you to send more Republicans to Washington Capitol Hill in Salt Lake and city & county offices across the state. https://t.co/u7mBiCFJ11
This will not age well. https://t.co/IJ8vkPJ5SV
He is risen! Today we celebrate the greatest gift the greatest miracle and the greatest sacrifice in existence. Jesus Christ the Son of God lives!
Happy birthday sweetheart. Seventy never looked so good! https://t.co/O7NeH9fdHr
Heartache at the loss of #NotreDameCathedral. Such beauty and such holiness built with such sacrifice.

After more than 11 years today is @Kelli_H’s last day with our team. Kelli @AnnRomney and I will forever be grateful for all you’ve done to keep the trains moving and the impact you’ve had on our lives. Best of luck in your next adventure. You’ll be sorely missed! https://t.co/k2JzcGyWpy
50 years with the love of my life. https://t.co/8TxkYncBGq

I can’t understand why the President would once again disparage a man as exemplary as my friend John McCain: heroic courageous patriotic honorable self-effacing self-sacrificing empathetic and driven by duty to family country and God.

Deeply saddened by the terrorist attacks at the mosques in New Zealand—pure evil. We must reject hatred in our own country and across the globe. Praying for the 49 innocent people who lost their lives and their families as well as those who were injured.

The President made the right decision to ground the 737 MAX. This is a commonsense step until the causes of the recent crashes have been investigated and pilots’ concerns have been addressed to ensure safety. https://t.co/2uJdVXbmIy
@AnnRomney Thank you sweetheart!
Out of an abundance of caution for the flying public the @FAANews should ground the 737 MAX 8 until we investigate the causes of recent crashes and ensure the plane’s airworthiness.
My team surprised me with a cake made out of my favorite snack—twinkies! Looking forward to all this year has in store. https://t.co/lQfyIrQ9Qe
The beauty of our state is unmatched—looking out over Eagle Canyon. https://t.co/bd4g9VOeC7

I am concerned that the Administration has yet to comply with the law nor has it sufficiently explained why. As has been requested by members of both parties I urge the Administration to rectify this urgent situation and brief Congress on its progress as soon as possible.

The question that Congress wants answered is whether any senior Saudi officials including members of the Saudi royal family were responsible for the murder of Jamal Khashoggi. By law the President is required to report to Congress on these findings & imposition of sanctions.
Even more smitten now than I was back then. Happy Valentine's Day sweetheart. https://t.co/4gnzGLWX2K
Here's to hoping Tom Brady gets to lift his 6th Lombardi tonight. Let's go Pats! https://t.co/iPxHn1fJku
